evidence.claim: Chronicled utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure, specifically mentioning AWS Lambda and Amazon S3.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance, indicating its services for health tech are secure and follow regulations.
Chronicled integrates healthcare data using FHIR standards, ensuring interoperability with electronic health records.
The platform utilizes an event-driven architecture for integrating various components and services seamlessly.

icp.icp_reason: Their tech stack includes X12 and health tech, indicating relevance for API automation in healthcare.
